text: Summer School is a 1987 comedy movie directed by Carl Reiner (who also stars) and starring Mark Harmon, Kirstie Alley, Courtney Thorne-Smith, Dean Cameron. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1987 comedy movies Category:1980s teen comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Carl Reiner Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Summer School (1987 movie)
